mapper.select: SELECT u_auth FROM pizza_auth WHERE 1=1 AND u_id=#{username}

SELECT u_id as username, u_password as password, u_no as uNo, u_name as uName, u_isAccountNonExpired as isAccountNonExpired, u_isAccountNonLocked as isAccountNonLocked, u_isCredentialNonExpired as isCredentialNonExpired, u_isEnabled as isEnabled FROM pizza_user WHERE 1=1 AND u_id = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pizza_user( u_id, u_password, u_name, u_isAccountNonExpired, u_isAccountNonLocked, u_isCredentialNonExpired, u_isEnabled, u_phone, u_level, u_disabled ) VALUES( #{username}, #{password}, #{uName}, #{isAccountNonExpired}, #{isAccountNonLocked}, #{isCredentialNonExpired}, #{isEnabled}, #{uPhone}, 1, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT tb.u_address_id AS uAddressId1, tb.u_address AS uAddress1, tb.u_zipcode AS uZipcode1, tb.u_store_id_ AS uStoreID FROM pizza_user ta LEFT JOIN pizza_user_address tb ON ta.u_id=tb.u_id WHERE ta.u_id= #{username}
